problem.p: For the following questions provide a numerical response formatted as a percentage. (If your answer is 50%, just enter 50)
problem.label: What percentage of the time is she serving customers?
What percentage of the time is she idle?

p.span: The fraction of serving time is the utilization \(\rho = \frac{\lambda}{\mu} = \frac{10}{15} = \frac{2}{3} = 66.7\)%. The fraction of idle time is \(1-0.6667=0.3333\).
